branchCategory.name: M(D)BKW-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchCategory.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.
branchCategory.bullets: <ul><li>Double acting, non rotating double rod</li><li>Bore sizes: 32, 40, 50, 63, 80, 100 (mm)</li><li>Strokes from 25mm through 700mm depending upon bore size</li><li>Mounts: basic, foot, flange, & center trunnion</li><li>With or without nylon or heat resistant rod boot, one end only</li><li>Variety of switches and a variety of lead wire lengths</li></ul>
